trans-unit.source:
Size
Choose the size of the callout.
(Default: Normal)

Style
Choose the background color of the callout. The colors have been predefined from the programmer.
(Default: Primary)

Animation Out
Choose the animation you want to display when you close the callout. Default fadeOut.

Closable
Choose whether the callout is closable or not.

Container
If you activate this option, then the callout will get the grid-container wrapped around it.
